data.actual_result: Only one of them hide (the option in overflow menu), the other doesn't (the blue button), which is pointless and weirdly designed
data.expected_result: Since those options do the same thing, they sould either both hide or both show to be consistent
data.short_description: Blocking a user on Android will hide the "Send a message" option in the overflow menu but does not hide the button at the bottom right which does the same thing
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to a user's profile - Notice that from this screen you have two ways to access the user's DMs : either via "Send a message" option in overflow menu or via the blue button at bottom right of the screen - Now block the user and observe those options
